commit message: bad version commited
incorrect concatentation of the android buildVersion

Android toggle buttons are inconsistent.  The XML attribute you define for a toggle event is called 'onClick', but the event listener should hook into onCheckedChanged().

This should correct the odd swipe vs click events in #980.
auto reformat
align all at wifis_sent_title
fix point overlay icons
fix bug
fix NullPointer

Reduce badnwidth at low zoom level: 'trick' the map into showing lower zoom levels.
For example, if the map is at zoom level x, show the tiles for x - 4.
I don't do this exactly.
This code has a low/high zoom level switch, at
the high zoom level, behave as before this commit; at the low zoom
level, trick the map into showing very low resolution tiles, so only a
few tiles need loading to cover the map area.

bad versionName codes were checked into dev. Changing 0.40.1.1 to 0.40.1.0
Updated the makefile so that `test` forces gradle to run assembleUnittest
Revert the NMEA checking code - some android devices don't send any NMEA data.
Removed jacoco from the gradle build as it was breaking tests using robolectric

* Added tests and code to verify that the a stumbler bundle will not
exceed MAX_WIFIS_PER_LOCATION and MAX_CELLS_PER_LOCATION
* Updated mozstumbler.Log to use System.out.println so that logs don't
show up on a single line during test.
* Changed allowed exception in mozstumbler.Log so that any Exception
type is allowed, not just IOException
* Removed test specific code in WifiScanner
